alert.message:
Product: IVR
Application: Orders API
Endpoint: Bushours
Percentile: N/A
Priority: P1
Message: (SADC) P1 TPS Trend Dip -50% or below 0.001, off hours traffic is expected to be less between (11.30pm, EST - 6am, EST),  if traffic do not ramp up above 0, please check backend systems for errors..
